benchmark_details.name: VOILA
benchmark_details.overview: VOILA is a large-scale, open-ended benchmark designed to evaluate MLLMsâ€™ perceptual understanding and abstract relational reasoning through an analogical mapping approach in the visual domain.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To evaluate the visual understanding and analogical reasoning capabilities of state-of-the-art MLLMs.

data.source: Generated using SDXL text-to-image model with various prompts.
data.annotation: Images generated manually filtered to ensure alignment with text prompts.

methodology.calculation: Accuracy is calculated based on correct property prediction across four reasoning steps.
methodology.interpretation: Higher accuracy indicates better performance in understanding visual relationships.
methodology.baseline_results: Human performance averages 70% accuracy as opposed to the best MLLM performance of 29%.
methodology.validation: Evaluated through extensive testing on multiple MLLMs and comparison with human performance.
